Lyric:
[00:03.230]Tell me something I need to know
[00:07.910]Then take my breath and never let it go
[00:12.880]If you just let me invade your space
[00:17.590]I'll take the pleasure, take it with the pain
[00:23.140]And if in the moment I bite my lip
[00:27.670]Baby in that moment you know this is
[00:32.640]Something bigger than us and beyond bliss
[00:37.360]Give me a reason to believe it
[00:41.360]Cause if you want to keep me
[00:44.300]You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta, got to love me harder
[00:51.130]And if you really need me
[00:53.920]You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta, got to love me harder
[00:59.290](Baby love me harder)
[01:01.840]Ooo love me, love me, love me
[01:06.100]Ooo harder, harder, harder
[01:11.190]I know your motives
[01:13.560]And you know mine
[01:15.800]The ones that love me
[01:18.120]I tend to leave behind
[01:20.790]If you know about me
[01:23.250]And choose to stay
[01:25.380]Then take this pleasure and take it with the pain
[01:30.820]And if in the moment you bite your lip
[01:35.530]When I get you moaning you'll know it's real
[01:40.510]Can you feel the pressure between your hips
[01:45.470]I'll make you feel like the first time
[01:49.250]Cause if you want to keep me
[01:52.100]You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta, got to love me harder
[01:57.310](Imma love ya harder)
[01:58.900]And if you really need me
[02:01.740]You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta, got to love me harder
[02:06.540](Love me harder)
[02:09.700]Ooo love me, love me, love me
[02:14.020]Ooo harder, harder, harder
[02:18.740]Ooo love me, love me, love me
[02:23.440]Ooo harder, harder, harder
[02:32.030](Love me harder)
[02:32.530]So what do I do if I can't figure it out
[02:35.330]You got to try, try, try again
[02:40.170]So what do I do if I can't figure it out
[02:44.860]I'm gonna leave, leave, leave again
[02:47.880]Cause it you want to keep me
[02:50.540]You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta, got to love me harder
[02:55.530](I will love, love, love)
[02:57.130]And if you really need me
[02:59.960]You gotta, gotta, gotta, got to, got to love me harder
[03:04.920](Love, love baby)
[03:06.980]Cause if you want to keep me
[03:09.800]You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta, got to love me harder
[03:14.800](Love me harder)
[03:16.820]And if you really need me
[03:22.110]You gotta, gotta, gotta, gotta, got to love me harder
[03:24.260](I'm gonna do it, do it. Imma love ya harder)
[03:27.700]Ooo love me, love me, love me (Love you)
[03:31.640]Ooo harder, harder, harder (Love me, love me baby)
[03:36.610]Ooo love me, love me, love me (Just a little bit harder, harder baby)
[03:41.830]Ooo harder, harder, harder
